editor.charRate: Chance to get Character instead of Light Cone
editor.resetPrompt: Are you sure to Reset "{banner}" probabilities back to default?

item.specialPassStory:
Direct ticket for the Astral Express with coordinates of specific worlds, suitable for passengers who just want to go from point A to point B.

"Need to catch up with an old friend? Hop on and see the universe with him/her/it/them!"
item.regularPassStory:
Astral Express Universal Pass. Travel as far as the Star Rail stretches.

"Map worlds, meet people, make memories."

warp.heading: Warp
warp.starterDescription: 20% off for set of 10 Warps, and a 5-star character is guaranteed within 50 Warps
warp.warpDescription: Every 10 Warps guarantees a 4-star or above entity
warp.itemRateBoost: Featured {itemtype} receives a drop rate boost
warp.convertModal: Insufficient {ticket}. Consume {jadeNeeded} Stellar Jade to purchase {ticketNeeded} {ticket}?
warp.expressNotLoaded: Cannot find Astral Express Animations in your storage, Load the Astral Express first, or Turn ON the option to skip Astral Express!
warp.preloadFilesMsg: * Loaded files will be stored to Browser Storage, so you don't need to load them again until the site update.
warp.sharingTxt: Come and try this Honkai: Star Rail Warp Simulator!

details.heading: Details
details.warpObtain: What you can obtain from Warp
details.warpNote: While no boosts or guarantees are in effect, the base rate of all characters and Light Cones will be evenly distributed.
details.eventWarpNote: ‚Äª This Warp is counted as a {banner}. The Warp count for the guarantee for any {banner} will always be carried over to other {banner}, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
details.rateupCharList: ‚óè There is a greatly increased Warp success rate for the limited 5-star character {featuredName} ({featuredPath}: {featuredCombatType}), and 4-star characters {char1} ({path1}: {combatType1}), {char2} ({path2}: {combatType2}), and {char3} ({path3}: {combatType3})
details.rateupLCList: ‚óè There is a greatly increased Warp success rate for the limited 5-star light cone {featuredName} ({featuredPath}), and 4-star light cones {lc1} ({path1}), {lc2} ({path2}), and {lc3} ({path3})
eventDetails: During the {banner}, you can use your Star Rail Special Passes for Warps.
‚óè Among the above {itemType}, the limited {itemType} will not be available in the Stellar Warp event.
eventWarpRate: For this {banner}, the chances of obtaining 5-star {itemType} and 4-star {itemType} are as follows:

‚óè During the event, the base chance of obtaining 5-star {itemType} is {base5Rate}, and the consolidated chance including the guarantee is {consolidated5Rate}. Every {maxPity} Warps guarantees a 5-star {itemType}.

‚óè During the event, the base chance of obtaining 4-star entities is {base4Rate}, the base chance of obtaining 4-star characters is {itemRate}, and the base chance of obtaining 4-star Light Cones is {itemRate}. The consolidated chance of obtaining 4-star rewards including the guarantee is {consolidated4Rate}. Every 10 Warps guarantees a 4-star or above character or Light Cone. The chance of obtaining a 4-star character or Light Cone from the guarantee is {guarantee4Rate} and the chance of obtaining a 5-star {itemType} is {base5Rate}
boostedRate: ‚óè The first time you obtain a 5-star {itemType} in this Warp event, there is a {winRate} chance it will be the promotional {itemType} {featuredName} ( {featuredPath} {featuredCombatType} ). If the first 5-star {itemType} you obtain in this Warp event is not the promotional {itemType}, then the next 5-star {itemType} you obtain is guaranteed to be the promotional {itemType}.
‚óè The first time you obtain a 4-star entity in this Warp event, there is a {winRate} chance it will be one of the promotional {itemType} {rateupList}.

‚óè If the first 4-star entity you obtain in this Warp event is not one of the promotional {itemType}, then the next 4-star {itemType} you obtain is guaranteed to be one of the promotional {itemType}. The rate of obtaining each promotional 4-star {itemType} is equal between all of them.
details.starterDescription:
The Departure Warp is a permanent Warp event, you can only make sets of 10 Warps. Every 10 Warps guarantees a 4-star or above character or Light Cone. Enjoy a 20% discount on the Star Rail Passes for 10-Warp sets.
You may only Warp up to 50 times for this event. At least one 5-star or above character is guaranteed within 50 Warps.
starterDetail: ‚óè In this event, the base chance of obtaining 5-star characters is 0.600%. The consolidated chance of obtaining 5-star characters (including guarantee) is 2.080%. Every 50 Warps guarantees a 5-star character.
details.regularDescription: Stellar Warp is a permanent Warp event, you can use your Star Rail Passes to obtain characters and Light Cones. In this event, every 10 Warps guarantees at least one 4-star or above character or Light Cone.
regular5starRate: ‚óè In this event, the base chance of obtaining 5-star characters and Light Cones is 0.600%, the base chance of obtaining 5-star characters is 0.300%, and the base chance of obtaining 5-star Light Cones is 0.300%. The consolidated chance of obtaining 5-star characters and Light Cones (including guarantee) is 1.600%. Every 90 Warps guarantees a 5-star character or Light Cone.
regular4starRate: ‚óè In this event, the base chance of obtaining 4-star characters and Light Cones is 5.100%, the base chance of obtaining 4-star characters is 2.550%, and the base chance of obtaining 4-star Light Cones is 2.550%. The consolidated chance of obtaining 4-star characters and Light Cones (including guarantee) is 12.160%. Every 10 Warps guarantees a 4-star or above character or Light Cone. The chance of obtaining a 4-star character or Light Cone from the guarantee is 99.400%, and the chance of obtaining a 5-star character is 0.600%.
‚óè In most cases, the base rate applies to all characters or Light Cones. If there is a boost or guarantee in effect, please refer to the corresponding rules.
details.convertion: Whenever you obtain a {rarity}-star Light Cone during the Warp, gain {undyingType} √ó{undyingBonus}.
details.duplicate: ‚óè On obtaining a {rarity}-star character that you already own (whether obtained in a Warp, redeemed at the shop, or redeemed from the system): The 2nd ‚Äì 7th time you obtain the character, it will be converted into that character's Eidolon √ó1 and {undyingType} √ó{bonusQty}; from the 8th time onwards, it will be converted into {undyingType} √ó{fullBonusQty}.

additionalReward.note: An extra 5-star character will be given when requirements are met.
additionalReward.detail: After taking 300 Warps in the Regular Warp event, you can choose one of these characters ‚Äî {characters} ‚Äî to join your team. This reward can only be claimed once.

description.himeko: An Erudition character who adept at dealing AoE damage. after enemies are Weakness Broken, accumulates Charges to launch follow-up attacks
description.bronya: A Harmony character who can grant extra action to a single ally, whose Ultimate can boost all allies' ATK
description.gepard: A Preservation character who can Shield allies team-wide, and can survive fatal DMG for 1 time
description.yanqing: A character of The Hunt Path who excets at dealing massive damage to a single enemy target instantly. Has and extremely high CRIT Rate and enhanced CRIT DMG, and is adept at attacking Frozen targets.
description.bailu: An Abundance character who excels at team-wide healing and can provide instant healing when allies take fatal damage.
description.welt: A Nihility character who can slowdown enemies' SPD
description.clara: A Destruction character who can reduce DMG taken

history.heading: History
history.description: All data was stored to IndexedDB, it means the data is saved on your browser storage. It will never deleted untill you delete it manualy through delete/reset button or clear the browser data.
history.resetPrompt:
It's also remove all Characters and Light Cone related to "{bannerName}" Banner from your Inventory.
Are You Sure to Reset ?
